tidbits.title: Diverse Landscapes
tidbits.description: Oman offers diverse landscapes, from deserts like the Wahiba Sands to stunning coastlines and the Hajar Mountains' rugged beauty.

tidbits.title: Rich Cultural Heritage
tidbits.description: The country has a rich cultural heritage seen in traditional architecture, souks, frankincense trade, and Bedouin-influenced traditions.

tidbits.title: Modern Development
tidbits.description: Oman balances its traditional values with modern development, focusing on infrastructure, tourism, and economic diversification.
